ygData.subject: RE: Stupid Question
ygData.msgSnippet: You underestimate me. I have been in the tunnel of ARENA. it is darker there than in Innothule at night. Don t treat me like I don t know what I am talking
ygData.messageBody:
You underestimate me. I have been in the tunnel of ARENA. it is darker there
than in Innothule at night. Don't treat me like I don't know what I am
talking about, as I am human, and have had to learn to travel without a
light stone, and without infravision in pitch blackness;) Can you say walk a
few steps, pulse Selos for the moment flash, walk a few steps.. =)

-----Original Message-----
From: Papa Legba [mailto:legba@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 08, 1999 9:19 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Stupid Question


From: Papa Legba <legba@...>

Man, infravision makes a HUGE difference over human vision. With
infravision, everything has a reddish tinge (especially when its dark),
but with human vision you are completly blind when it dark, go to a dark
zone and see what i mean. (like Innothule swamp). Ultravision is even
better as you see almost the same and day and night, though at night
everything is bluish...
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
